home.title: Yi Board Game
home.subtitle: Platform for Tutorials, Online Play, and Prototyping

destroy.title: Destroy Room
destroy.description: Are you sure you want to destroy this room?

leave.title: Leave Room
leave.description: Are you sure you want to leave this room?

exitActiveMatch.title: Leave Current Match
exitActiveMatch.description: You are in a match. Leave it and join the new room?

actions.forceExitHint: Clear local data (room may still exist on server)

activeMatch.notice: You are currently in a match

rooms.ownerMustReconnect: This is your room. Please reconnect.
rooms.ownerRejoinOnly: Only the room owner can rejoin an empty room (guests must use the original browser/device; clearing storage requires creating a new room)
rooms.inAnotherMatch: You are already in another match

gameDetails.description: Classic strategy play. Connect three symbols to win.

tictactoe.title: Tic-Tac-Toe
tictactoe.description: Classic X and O game. Challenge the AI or face a friend.

dicethrone.title: Dice Throne
dicethrone.description: A fast-paced, easy-to-learn game where you choose the most extraordinary hero from many. Roll your hero's unique 5 dice to attack opponents and activate abilities. Accumulate combat points to purchase powerful cards‚Äîupgrade your hero, cast spells, or directly manipulate dice (yours, your teammates', or your opponents').

smashup.title: Smash Up
smashup.description: Smash Up is a 2-4 player card battle game! Combine two different factions to compete for base control and victory points; the first to 15 points wins. The base game includes 8 distinct factions, enabling many strategic pairings and playstyles. (Year: 2012; Type: Competitive/Card; Rating: 7.2)

assetslicer.title: Asset Slicer
assetslicer.description: A toolkit for board game assets. Supports circular/square cuts and sprite exports.

fxpreview.title: Effect Preview
fxpreview.description: Preview all common animation effects (flying particles, shake, hit-stop, slash, burst).

audiobrowser.title: Audio Browser
audiobrowser.description: Browse and preview all common audio assets by category, with keyword search and filtering.

ugcbuilder.title: UGC Prototype Builder
ugcbuilder.description: Quickly create board game prototypes. Supports card design, rule config, and AI-assisted generation.

archview.title: Architecture View
archview.description: Interactive node-edge diagram showing the platform's layered architecture and module dependencies.

summonerwars.title: Summoner Wars
summonerwars.description: A tactical card game where you command a faction of warriors on a battlefield grid. Summon units, cast spells, and destroy the enemy Summoner to win.

matchRoom.leaveFailed: Failed to leave the room. Please try again.

destroy.title: Destroy Room
destroy.description: Destroy this room? The match will end and cannot be restored.
destroy.missingCredentials: Cannot destroy room: missing credentials. Please refresh or rejoin.
destroy.notAllowed: Cannot destroy room: permission or credential error.
destroy.failed: Failed to destroy the room: backend did not respond or the request failed. Please try again.
destroy.forceExitDescription: Destroy failed and may keep you stuck here. You can clear local data and return to the lobby (the room may still exist on the server).

autoExit.message: Host left, the room is closed. Returning to lobby‚Ä¶
autoExit.title: Auto Exit Notice

matchRoom.noTutorial: Tutorial not available for this game

error.matchMissing: Room not found or already deleted

connectionTimeout.title: Connection Timeout
connectionTimeout.description: Unable to connect to the game server. Please check your network or server status.

error.createRoomNetwork: Unable to connect to the game service. Make sure it is running and check CORS/proxy settings.
error.createRoomCors: The browser blocked the cross-origin request. Please use a local proxy or check CORS settings.
error.createRoomInvalidToken: Your login session is invalid or expired. Please sign in again.
error.createRoomGuestId: Guest identity error. Please refresh the page and try again.
error.createRoomForbidden: You do not have permission to create a room.
error.createRoomNotFound: Game service could not find the game. Please refresh and try again.
error.createRoomRequestSize: Request payload error. Please refresh and try again.
error.activeMatchStale: Your previous room no longer exists. It has been cleared so you can create a new one.
error.destroyForbidden: Unable to destroy the room: invalid or expired credentials. Please re-enter the match and try again.
error.destroyNetwork: Failed to destroy the room due to network or service issues. Please try again later.
error.destroyFailedLocalCleaned: Destroy request failed. Local state has been cleared so you can continue.
error.localStateCleared: Local state cleared. You can create or join a room again.
error.roomDestroyed: Room was destroyed. Local state has been cleared.
error.activeMatchExists: You already have an active room. Please return to it or destroy it before creating a new one.
error.leaveForbidden: Unable to leave the room: invalid or expired credentials. Please re-enter the match and try again.
error.leaveNetwork: Failed to leave the room due to network or service issues. Please try again later.
error.ownerClaimFailed: Unable to reconnect: guest identity may be lost or credentials expired after server restart. Please retry with the original browser or create a new room.
error.roomCreatedButClaimFailed: Room was created but failed to claim seat. Please go back to the lobby and try again.
error.actionFailed: Action failed, please try again later.

serviceUnavailable.title: Service Unavailable
serviceUnavailable.desc: Unable to connect to backend services. Please check your connection and ensure the backend containers (MongoDB/Server) are running.

createRoom.title: Create Room
createRoom.retentionHint: Reconnect within retention period; auto-cleanup after expiry

socket.heartbeatStale: Heartbeat indicates stale version, refreshing lobby: {{version}} current {{current}}
